item.description:
Wednesday evening NOVEMBER 17. X & O RESTAURANT, Rte. 138, Stoughton. (781)283-5900.
6:30-9:30 PM. For single professionals 40-60 years old.
Cost of $45 includes a complete 5-course dinner, tax, and tip. Each attendee receives a VIP GUEST PASS worth $13.
Reservations required by calling (781)283-5900.
Proper dress required; ties & jackets strongly recommended.
Seating limited to 20 men & 20 women. Cocktail party, 6:30-7. Each guest changes seats after every course to insure personally meeting each person of the opposite sex. www.se-4u.com.
Everyone encouraged to swap business cards.

Make 39 new friends, have 20 dates...one fun night.
THE BEST IN 'SLOW DATING.'
item.how_to_find_us: Ask for Pam at the door.
item.name: "SINGLES DINING OUT"
